Simulation

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
      • Simulation.Max
        • Simulation.Simulation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fluid, Particles

    public abstract class Simulation
extends Max
    Simulation is a Max's abstraction that provide blobs system for it's children Please note that Simulation is an abstract class and each children will be an instantiable Max Object.
